section.title: time and expense sheets management of Time and Expense Sheet
section.para: The Time and Expense Sheet is the weekly container for holding time and expenses entered by Employees. As Employees enter time and expense sheets during the course of a week, the Time and Expense Sheet organizes those entries. When the next week arrives, a new Time and Expense Sheet is created and Employee time and expense entries are contained there. Typically, Time and Expense Sheets are approved on a weekly basis.
To review an already-existing Time and Expense Sheet, select the EDIT option on the main Time and Expense Sheets workbench. The following screen will appear:

note.para: For more information on using Time and Expense Sheets to help manage projects, please see the eBook Managing Projects with xTuple.

section.para: When reviewing a Time and Expense Sheet, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the system-generated number of the Time and Expense Sheet.
Displays the date for the week contained by the Time and Expense Sheet. The date is set manually when creating a new Time and Expense Sheet.
Displays the Site associated with the work. The Site is chosen manually when creating a new Time and Expense Sheet.
Displays the name of the Employee associated with the Time and Expense Sheet. The Employee is entered manually when creating a new Time and Expense Sheet.
Select to automatically print the Time and Expense Sheet whenever it is saved.
